snippet: The New Yorker Festival will feature interviews with Billy Joel, Toni Morrison and Lin-Manuel Miranda.
abstract: The New Yorker Festival will feature interviews with Billy Joel, Toni Morrison and Lin-Manuel Miranda.
lead_paragraph: The 2015 New Yorker Festival will cover comedy, race and technology with some of the leaders in each field. Featuring interviews with Toni Morrison, Lin-Manuel Miranda, Billy Joel and Jason Segel, the 16th annual festival will run from Oct. 2 to 4 in New York and include live performances, film previews and a new tech conference.
